posts.post_content:
I am in need of 26 T204 Ramly's and have 31 duplicate T204 cards to trade  (mostly lower grades).  These cards and a number of others can be viewed at:

[url]www.imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url] if you have any questions or interest.

Here are the 26 T204's that I still need:

Arrelanes
Beebe
